txt.en: 'I have travelled the lands from the Vale of Thr√°in to the Lonely Mountain, but nowhere compares to the Halls of Thorin.'
'My trade company is often looking for stalwart travellers, such as yourself, for guards.'
'Seek out the trade hall if you wish to purchase goods or equipment. I do not carry my goods on me like some tinker.'
'The glimmer of gold can be mined from pockets as well as mountain shafts.'
